import React, { useState } from 'react' import { AppInput } from '../components/UI/appInput' import { Indicator } from '../components/UI/indicator' import { Heading } from '../typography/heading' const StepOne = () => { const [answer, setAnswer] = useState(null) const isButtonDisabled = !answer const handleAnswerInput = (e) => { setAnswer(e.target.value) } return (
) } export default StepOne
